stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: IXR 2016 5033 1
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: Four emails with four malicious domains and malware content in email attachments.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malicious FQDN Indicator
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: Malicious domain with associated malicious artifact following requested page
